name: purescript-concur-ui
description: A port of Elm-UI to Purescript Concur

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && spago build && parcel build --public-url ./ index.html
scripts.prod: rimraf prod dist && mkdir prod && spago bundle-app --main Main --to prod/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js prod/index.prod.js --js_output_file prod/index.js && cp index.html prod/index.html && parcel build --public-url ./ prod/index.html && rimraf prod
scripts.docs: npm run prod && rimraf docs && mv dist docs
